name: Date & Time Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Date & Time Tool 节点。主要用于: Manipulate date and time values

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Manipulate date and time values | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getCurrentDate
available_options: Extract Part of a Date (值: extractDate)

notice.displayName: You can also do this using an expression, e.g. {{ your_date.extract("month") }}}. More info
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: You can also do this using an expression, e.g. {{ your_date.extract("month") }}}. More info

includeTime.name: includeTime
includeTime.description: When deactivated, the time will be set to midnight
includeTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Current Time | 作用: When deactivated, the time will be set to midnight | 默认值: True

outputFieldName.name: outputFieldName
outputFieldName.description: Name of the field to put the output in
outputFieldName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output Field Name | 作用: Name of the field to put the output in | 默认值: datePart

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: includeInputFields (值: None) - Whether to include all fields of the input item in the output item

magnitude.name: magnitude
magnitude.description: The date that you want to change
magnitude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date to Subtract From | 作用: The date that you want to change | (必填项)

timeUnit.name: timeUnit
timeUnit.description: Time unit for Duration parameter below
timeUnit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Time Unit to Subtract | 作用: Time unit for Duration parameter below | 默认值: days | (必填项)

duration.name: duration
duration.description: The number of time units to subtract from the date
duration.natural_language_description: 参数名: Duration | 作用: The number of time units to subtract from the date | 默认值: 0

date.name: date
date.description: The date that you want to round
date.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date | 作用: The date that you want to round

format.name: format
format.description: The format to convert the date to
format.natural_language_description: 参数名: Format | 作用: The format to convert the date to | 默认值: MM/dd/yyyy
available_options: MMMM DD YYYY (值: MMMM dd yyyy) - Example: April 09 1986

customFormat.name: customFormat
customFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Format | 提示: List of special tokens More info

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 默认值: roundDown

toNearest.name: toNearest
toNearest.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Nearest | 默认值: month

to.name: to
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 默认值: month

units.name: units
units.natural_language_description: 参数名: Units | 默认值: ['day']

part.name: part
part.natural_language_description: 参数名: Part | 默认值: month
